title: Jar And Cover, ca. 1800
provenance: John Dooley and Sons, Ltd., Dublin; 1959 WPW
description: Tall urn-shaped body; tapered, fluted stem; square base with star cutting on bottom; tall domed cover with faceted finial; body cut with row of narrow flutes, band of diamonds, a garland circlet, wide flutes down to base; cover cut with conforming pattern; glass greenish and bubly, heavy.

tombstone.epitaph:
Jar And Cover, ca. 1800.
ca. 1800. Glass. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-126-a,b.
